Become a Genius

12 Oct 2015

We all want to be smarter. Thomas Oppong put together a list of 33 Web sites that we all can use to become geniuses.

“I have no special talent, I am only passionately curious.” – Albert EinsteinA few of my favorites from his list:

  • University of the People – having educational opportunities that reach beyond online video courses is fantastic.
  • Coursera – this one is always on every list I make regarding top educational resources.
  • Investopedia – knowing more about how the markets work and personal finance can never be a bad thing.
  • Mental Floss – great for learning about some of the cooler topics science, culture, and society.
  • In a Nutshell – while not technically on the list, this YouTube channel put together by some german graphic artists covers a wide array of topics in a way anyone can understand, with awesome visuals.
  • C.G.P. Grey – also not technically on the list, however as an educational YouTube resource, Grey tops that list, if there is one. Check out the rest of Thomas’ list if you’re curious. I recommend you check out every link he listed.
